name: cc-safety-net
description: Claude Code / OpenCode plugin - block destructive git and filesystem commands before execution

scripts.build: bun build src/index.ts src/bin/cc-safety-net.ts --outdir dist --target node && bun run build:types && bun run build:schema
scripts.check: bun run lint && bun run typecheck && bun run knip && bun run sg:scan && AGENT=1 bun test
scripts.setup-hooks:
bun -e 'await Bun.write(".husky/pre-commit", "#!/usr/bin/env sh

bun run knip && bun run lint-staged
")' && chmod +x .husky/pre-commit
